import{privateAxios}from"./helper";import{myAxios}from"./helper";//create post function
export var createPost=function createPost(postData){//   console.log(postData);
return privateAxios.post("/user/".concat(postData.userId,"/category/").concat(postData.categoryId,"/posts"),postData).then(function(response){return response.data;});};//get all posts
export var loadAllPosts=function loadAllPosts(pageNumber,pageSize){console.log(pageNumber,pageSize);return myAxios.get("/posts?pageNumber=".concat(pageNumber,"&pageSize=").concat(pageSize,"&sortBy=addedDate&sortDir=desc")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};//get by catagory
export var loadPostByCat=function loadPostByCat(categoryId){console.log(categoryId);return myAxios.get("/posts/cat/".concat(categoryId)).then(function(response){return response.data;});};//load single post of given id
export var loadPost=function loadPost(postId){return myAxios.get("/posts/"+postId).then(function(reponse){return reponse.data;});};export var createComment=function createComment(comment,postId){return privateAxios.post("/post/".concat(postId,"/comments"),comment);};//upload post banner
export var uploadPostImage=function uploadPostImage(image,postId){var formData=new FormData();formData.append("image",image);return privateAxios.post("/upload/image/".concat(postId),formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}}).then(function(response){return response.data;});};export var getPostByUserId=function getPostByUserId(userId){console.log(userId);return myAxios.get("/user/".concat(userId,"/posts")).then(function(response){return response.data;});};
